cgcloud__Rate_Based_Funding__c.name: cgcloud__Rate_Based_Funding__c
cgcloud__Rate_Based_Funding__c.description: This object stores general information along with metadata that's associated with the RBF Template from which it was created.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: Anchor Account for which the RBF is defined.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Controls whether Rate Based Funds can be used.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Currency of the rate based funding template.

cgcloud__Date_From__c.description: Start date of the rate based fund.

cgcloud__Date_Thru__c.description: End date of the rate based fund.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description of the rate based fund.

cgcloud__External_Id__c.description: Unique identifier for the external system RBF record.

cgcloud__Fund_Template_Type__c.description: Label of a Fund Template. Funds of this type are to be filled by this RBF (if the anchor accounts, products, and time ranges also match).

cgcloud__KPI_Subset__c.description: KPI subset allows to filter KPI definitions in the GridHierarchyView component. No subset filter is applied when no KPI subset is chosen

cgcloud__Manual_Override__c.description: Controls when a child can be updated by the parent in the RBF Distribution process.

cgcloud__Original_Reference__c.description: Reference to the parent RBF record.

cgcloud__Parent_RBF__c.description: Contains the reference of the parent in the RBF Distribution process.

cgcloud__RBF_Anchor_Type__c.description: Reference to the anchor of the rate based fund.

cgcloud__RBF_KPI_Set__c.description: KPI set that's assigned to the rate based fund.

cgcloud__RBF_Rate_Type__c.description: Type of rate that's used for the rate based funding record.

cgcloud__RBF_Total_KPI__c.description: Name of the KPI definition that represents the total calculated value.

cgcloud__Rate_Based_Funding_Template__c.description: Template that's used for the rate based funding record.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: Status of the rate based funding record.

cgcloud__Stop_Transacting_Unlock__c.description: This field is used to signal that the record can be safely unlocked as part of the stop transacting process.

cgcloud__Total_Amount__c.description: Total calculated as derived from interaction with the RBF Grid (aggregate of all RBF-Product calculated values).
